Chapter.Label: The Small Algebra Package
Chapter.Heading: Small ComplementedLattices Package
Chapter.Section:
Accessing Small ComplementedLattices AllSmallComplementedLattices is an accessor function for accessing the complete list of non-isomorphic complementedlattices models from orders 2 to 9.
The models are generated by Mace4 , using the definitions in Section .

Definition of ComplementedLattices formulas(ComplementedLattices).
(x + y) + z = x + (y + z).
(x * y) * z = x * (y * z).
x + y = y + x.
x * y = y * x.
(x + y) * x = x.
(x * y) + x = x.
0 + x = x.
1 + x = 1.
all x exists y (x + y = 1 & x * y = 0).
end_of_list.
Dependency This package has dependencies on the Magmaut package.
